mapper.insert: insert into wish_detail (wish_detail_id, wish_list_id, wish_goods_id, wish_goods_amount, wish_goods_status) values (NULL , #{wishListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wishGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wishGoodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wishGoodsStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select wish_detail_id, wish_list_id, wish_goods_id, wish_goods_amount, wish_goods_status from wish_detail
select count(*) from wish_detail where wish_list_id = #{wishListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select wish_detail_id, wish_list_id, wish_goods_id, wish_goods_amount, wish_goods_status from wish_detail where wish_list_id = #{wishListId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and wish_goods_id = #{wishGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
